General_Description: '''Killing the Blues''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]] is making a quick push on the [[Athenian army]]. We need to lower their ranks of elites, then Sparta can make its big offensive."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of Athenian [[Marksman|marksmen]] and [[Nation Leader|leaders]] throughout [[Greece]], and gained rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
